name: Ball of the Rice
description:
Welcome to the most daunting, most challenging, most exquisite of casino games! You are a ball on a dangerous adventure down the green lane. The Dice clan has been summoned to stop you but you might just be able to poke a hole in that plan.

Controls

WASD or arrow keys to switch lanes (horizontally)
SPACE to slow your fall

Credits

"Conflicted" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Background

This was our first game made with Godot (mono build) and the experience has been rather... challenging. We decided for now to settle for the current playable state of the game and return to different tools next time.
